title: Battle Boost isn't unlocking all the skins.
body:
I'm talking about all the visible ones. Not the legacy and whatnot.

For example, Reaper Soraka is not unlocked with a Battle Boost. There's another one that I found the other day too but I forgot what it was.

replies.body: You can select from any of the skins currently available in the store for that champion.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=1rp09JbL,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-17T18:07:56.285+0000)
>
> You can select from any of the skins currently available in the store for that champion.

Ah, I see. Thanks.
Well Iron Solari Leona is available in the store, but doesn't show in Champ Select unless you own the skin.
I was under the impression Reaper Soraka went into the vault with the other Halloween skins.

> [{quoted}](name=Valkyrie Witch,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=1rp09JbL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-17T07:50:28.200+0000)
>
> I was under the impression Reaper Soraka went into the vault with the other Halloween skins.

That may be true, though it still shows up as an option. Also, I believe that the other skin that I was referring to was one of the team skins.

They have to be available to purchase, not just visible in the store. Team skins, event skins etc. are all locked so shouldn't be unlocked with the Battle Boost. If there are some special event skins that the Battle Boost makes available, idk.
